mapper.select: select free_no, credential_id, title, userid, regdate, hit, depth, step, refer, filename from ( select rownum rn, free_no, credential_id, title, userid, regdate, hit, depth, step, refer, filename from ( select free_no, credential_id, title, userid, regdate, hit, depth, step, refer, filename from pj_freeboard where ${param3} like '%${param4}%' order by refer desc, step asc ) order by rn ) where rn between #{param1} and #{param2}
select count(*) from pj_freeboard where ${param1} like '%${param2}%'
select free_no, title, content, userid, credential_id, filename, regdate, refer, depth, step from pj_freeboard where free_no=#{free_no}

select userid, re_no, free_no, credential_id, content, regdate from ( select rownum rn, re_no, free_no, credential_id, userid, content, regdate from pj_re_freeboard where free_no=#{free_no} order by re_no asc )
mapper.update: update pj_freeboard set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, filename=#{filename} where free_no=#{free_no}
mapper.insert: insert into pj_freeboard(free_no, credential_id, userid, refer, depth, step, hit, title, regdate, filename, content ) values(PJ_FREEBOARD_NO.nextval, #{credential_id}, #{userid}, #{refer}, #{depth}, #{step}, #{hit}, #{title}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{filename},#{content})

insert into PJ_RE_FREEBOARD ( re_no, free_no, credential_id, userid, content, regdate ) values ( RE_FREE_SEQ.nextval, #{free_no}, #{credential_id}, #{userid}, #{content}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
mapper.update: update pj_freeboard SET hit=hit+1 where free_no=#{free_no}
update pj_freeboard set step=step+1, depth=depth+1 where refer=#{param1} and step>#{param2}
mapper.select: select count(*) from PJ_RE_FREEBOARD where free_no=#{list_no}
